Description:
Immaculate Central Cowes Investment!
This immaculate light filled unit of brick construction with quality fittings throughout is located in an excellent position within walking distance to the north facing Cowes beach and main shopping strip in Thompson Avenue, offering an array of cafe's, restaurants, and boutique shops.
With low maintenance surrounds and good provision for parking, the unit itself offers a very spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen area with stone bench tops and gleaming tiled floor, three generous bedrooms including the master with ensuite.
Additional features include: 2 x split systems heating/cooling, dishwasher, stone bench tops throughout, sunny outdoor courtyard, 2000 litre water tank, exposed aggregate concrete driveways, and single remote garage, with internal access.
This quality built home is currently used as a holiday rental investment property, separately titled (with no body corporate) and offering solid annual returns. It would also appeal as a permanent home for those looking for a low maintenance property in a very convenient location.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
Insights: 1/283 Settlement Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
The Cornerstone Of Your Investment Portfolio! AUCTION ON SITE: JANUARY 24 2019 at 1.00PM
On offer is the perfect and rare opportunity to purchase a prime piece of commercial real estate in one of the most prominent and busy locations in Cowes.
This fabulously located property boasts three individual leaseholds including two separate shops and a second level residential living space. The high-profile property is in an outstandingly prominent street position on the town's main road, Thompson Avenue, making this the perfect investment to add to your portfolio.
Occupied by established tenants who are staple landmarks to the local community; Cafe Lugano and Flowers of Phillip Island. In addition, the cafe space also boasts a phenomenal court yard and additional gallery space. The residential apartment sitting above the retail space offers two bedrooms and a spacious kitchen, dining and living room and is also currently tenanted meaning this will truly be a set and forget property for the lucky investor.
AUCTION ON SITE: JANUARY 24th 2019 at 1:00PM.
This property for AUCTION in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Splash At The Seaside!
This prime walk-to-everything' location offers the perfect coastal environment and low-maintenance getaway for the modern pleasure-seeker. Immaculately presented and contemporary in its design, this apartment is metres from the pristine Cowes north facing beach and minutes' walk from all the action of Cowes town centre.
Located on the lower level is a spacious open plan living, kitchen and dining area that flows out to a lovely private courtyard/alfresco area. Complimented by a seaside mural, this space is a wonderful space for entertaining.
The upper level of the residence comprises the master bedroom with built in robes and a large ensuite as well as a sliding door to a North facing balcony capturing beautiful water views across Westernport Bay. Also on this level is a very generous sized second bedroom with built in robes, a central family bathroom and a third bedroom with direct access to the balcony.
Additional features include two car space carport, split-system heating and cooling and a clever European laundry.
This spacious and very comfortable unit would be ideal for permanent or holiday living, there is nothing to be done - just move in and start enjoying the perfect coastal lifestyle!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Bring Back The Sparkle
Offering the ideal introduction to the Cowes relaxed beachside lifestyle, this elevated two bedroom home sits serenely on a 619sqm (approx.) allotment. Comprising open plan living, dining & kitchen upstairs with separate toilet, laundry and bathroom downstairs. A newly built deck looks over the established trees.
Located in close proximity to the gorgeous Red Rocks Beach and only a short drive to the Cowes shops and restaurants, this home is ready and waiting for you to add your special touch.

Description:
CENTRAL LOCATION
Situated on a unique, fully fenced corner block (approximately 658m2) and located in a convenient area within a short walk of the CBD.
Open plan kitchen/dining/living zones surrounded by large windows allowing the sunlight in. Double doors open from this space to a full north facing deck. Perfect for entertaining and enjoying peace and quiet.
The property features beautiful established trees and gardens, double lock up garage, private yard and is family friendly. Located on the eastern side of Cowes, close to primary school, golf club, and bowls club.
With its north facing aspect and quiet street location, this property offers a lovely family home or holiday retreat.

Description:
GREAT CENTRAL LOCATION - OFFERS INVITED
This two storey, 3 bedroom townhouse offers low maintenance living, in a fantastic central location. All that Cowes has to offer is within easy walking distance. Only a few minutes walk to the main shopping strip, with it's restaurants, cafes, and supermarkets, plus it's only a 5 minute walk to the beach, medical facilities & the school.
From the moment that you park your car in the double garage and walk through the door, you can sense it. Yes, you've found it. Your island home. Leave your car in the garage and your worries at the door. Relax! You're on Island Time, now!
Warm & inviting, the kitchen is the hub of this home. It features Stainless steel appliances, a walk-in pantry & plenty of storage. An island bench with room for seating, means that you can pull up a stool and have a lovely chat over a cuppa, or is the perfect informal dining experience. Continuing out from the kitchen are the dining and living areas. Split system air conditioners are located upstairs and downstairs, offering year round comfort. Open plan & north facing, these areas are full of light and warmth on a cold winter's day.
Continuing through the downstairs area, you will find the master bedroom, with built in robes, and main bathroom. The upstairs area offers a fantastic second living area, for family to relax in, an additional 2 bedrooms, both with built in robes, plus a second bathroom.
The rear courtyard, which is accessible through sliding doors from the living area, is designed for low maintenance, with its decked and landscaped areas, and is fully fenced offering plenty of privacy. The covered deck area has been extended to incorporate a spa- your own piece of tropical paradise.
Whether you are looking for a permanent home, holiday home or investment property, look no further. The opportunity to own a townhouse in this great, central location, doesn't come around often, so call our office now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Everything is so Close!
Set amongst Idyllic surrounds and offering a splendid central location, is this single level family home.
The weatherboard residence comprises spacious light filled open plan living/kitchen/dining, three robed bedrooms and two bathrooms.
Offering a host of additional features including split system heating cooling, evaporative cooling throughout, enclosed double carport with rear access ideal for trailers, boats etc and garage with attached workshop at the rear.
The undercover entertainment deck has cafe blinds allowing for year round comfort and flows off the dining area which overlooks the private tranquil rear yard.
All set within a 746m2 approx fenced allotment only 100 metres from Cowes Primary school and a short stroll to doctors, supermarkets shops, restaurants and the stunning Cowes Beach.
This beautifully presented property is ideal for permanent or holiday living.
Inspections are by appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BEACH WITHIN REACH!
Centrally located in Cowes, this three bedroom, two bathroom home is sure to impress.
The master bedroom comes with an en-suite and a walk in robe. The additional two bedrooms both have built in robes and come off the hallway that leads to the main bathroom and laundry area.
There is a central kitchen with new dishwasher recently installed. The dining living area is open plan and light filled. Soak in the sun all day on the north facing deck and enjoy the fully fenced grassed rear yard.
A stylish coastal design this house is located close to the Anderson boat ramp and the safe North facing swimming beaches of Cowes.
Forget the car, from here you can walk to all that the main street of Cowes has to offer.
The property is currently tenanted until August 2019. Purchase short term as an investment opportunity and then, have the option to move in, or utilise as your ideal beach getaway.
Features also include:
1. New Bosch dishwasher and stove top recently installed – Bosch range hood has been
purchased and comes with the property
2. New roller blinds installed throughout the property
3. New screen door installed
4. New storage shed installed
5. All decks, fences and steps upgraded and stained in 2018
Look no further, inspect now!

Description:
IDEAL HOLIDAY HOME CLOSE TO RED ROCKS BEACH
This superb two storey holiday home has room for the whole family and is only a short stroll to the picturesque Red Rocks Beach, a North facing bay beach safe for swimming.
The four bedroom home provides plenty of room for the extended family on holidays. The lower level features a large living area complete with bar, one spacious bedroom and bathroom with shower and laundry.
The upper level comprises of a second living area that opens onto a North facing deck, kitchen/dining area with electric oven, three bedrooms all with built in robes, a second bathroom and separate toilet. Heating and cooling for the upstairs area is provided by a large split system.
Other features include a double car port , dual access driveway and separate single garage at the rear of the fully fenced block. This property would be ideal for either holiday or permanent living. Inspection is sure to impress.

Description:
CAREFREE COASTAL LIVING
Standing proudly in an exclusive estate of Cowes lies an ideally suited home for both families and retirees.
Light and bright, level one offers an immaculate kitchen with updated stainless steel appliances and an abundance of bench space which overlooks the expansive dining area where families can gather.
An ample open plan living room provides direct access to the balcony and outdoor entertaining deck where you’ll enjoy sun filled afternoons and lazy Sunday mornings with glimpses of Western Port Bay.
The master bedroom with walk-in robe and 2-way ensuite bathroom complete this level.
Downstairs gives privacy with a further two robed bedrooms, rumpus room, second bathroom and laundry.
A private low maintenance outdoor entertainment area is situated to one side with a double open garage and storage shed on the other. (Potential boat space is also provided) Conveniently positioned walking distance to playground.
A perfect home ready to move in and enjoy!
Call Vincent and Sandra today for your free no obligation market appraisal Ph: 5678 8506

Description:
Securing a Lifestyle!
This delightful and immaculately presented property comprises a three bedroom home as well as a fabulous studio providing several accommodation options in a sought after location within walking distance to the shops, cafes, schools, RSL, doctors and so much more! Situated in a peaceful environment, simply relax and enjoy a timelessly styled home with a low maintenance lifestyle.
The light filled home comprises a spacious open plan living and dining area and a modern kitchen with dishwasher, electric cooktop and electric under bench oven, three bedrooms all with built in robes, a family bathroom and laundry. A lovely north facing deck overlooking the lush green lawn, captures all day sun and is the perfect spot to relax.
The studio apartment also has everything you need with an open plan kitchen, living, dining area including space for a queen size bed plus a separate bathroom combined laundry. There is also a covered terrace to enjoy the outdoors all year round.
This is a rare opportunity that won't last long so call today before you miss out!

Description:
Elevated Contemporary Living in Cowes
Properties like this do not present themselves every day.
This outstanding architect designed home is perched high on the hill in Cowes, with distant water views, and elevated aspect.
From the moment you enter the home, you will be impressed by the quality finishes and fittings throughout.
Cleverly constructed over two levels, this home offers single level living from the front entrance, which comprises of 3 generous bedrooms, (master with ensuite and walk in robe) family bathroom and large open plan living, kitchen, dining area, studio and office space and outdoor wrap-around balcony.
Take the stairs or use the elevator to descend to the lower level of the home, where you will find a fully self contained 1 bedroom apartment, large laundry, huge storage area, and double garage. The lower accommodation is currently used as a holiday let business for the current owners, and delivers great occupancy rates, and excellent annual returns (and has won travel industry awards).
Outside the property features continue with electric gates, accessing the lower accommodation, garage and yard where you will find a carport - perfect for boat/caravan storage, and more carparking spaces. The low maintenance landscaped gardens, exposed aggregate driveway, and modwood decking, create an easy care outdoor space.
The features don't end there! The property also boasts:-
Electric elevator
900mm stainless steel appliances
Ducted vacuum
Laundry chute
Solar hot water
3.5 kw German PV Solar System (with 18 panels)
Alarmed security system and external lighting
20,000 litre water tanks servicing the external grounds
Split system heating and cooling throughout
Gas log fire
Equipped gymnasium
Property serviced by reticulated gas system
Foxtel satellite dish
NBN connected
All this is situated on a large 902sqm allotment, within walking distance to the north facing Cowes foreshore, Thompson Avenue shops, cafes and wine bars, supermarkets, schools and medical services.
Suited to various buyer demographics, this home would be ideally suitable for permanent living - while also offering the potential to generate income through the self contained accommodation.
Inspections by private appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
PERFECTLY POSITIONED
Located within an easy walk to both the beach and main shopping strip of Cowes, is this gorgeous, recently renovated home.
The home is separated into two distinct zones, living areas to the west and the bedrooms to the east. The master bedroom has glass sliding door access out the rear deck. A walk in robe and ensuite complete the master suite. From here you make your way past the study and main bathroom, with bath, to two additional bedrooms, both with built in robes. The large laundry, also has access to the rear deck.
The open plan dining & living area is light and bright, with Its polished timber floorboards and cathedral ceiling providing an additional sense of space. The living area also has reverse cycle a/c & ceiling fan, and access to the front deck via sliding glass door. Adjoining the dining area is the kitchen, which is modern and functional. Stainless steel appliances, include dishwasher, electric cooktop and oven, & canopy rangehood. A second living area flows from this main area. A wood heater provides a cosy space on those colder days. With a north facing aspect, the large covered deck connects the two wings of the house. With its high raked ceiling, and a sweep fan installed, this is the perfect area for year round entertaining. The deck steps down into the backyard and bbq area, and a large grassed area for those backyard cricket matches.
The fully fenced yard provides a great secure area for children and pets to play. A spacious front yard, double garage and carport, provide ample parking.
This is the ideal family home, in a great, central location. Call our office today to arrange your private inspection, as this property will not last long.

Description:
Smart Buying in Whytesands
This newly built house, located in a quiet location in the family friendly Whytesands estate within an easy 15 minute stroll to the north facing Cowes beach, and a short drive into town is this immaculate 3-bedroom plus study nook family home. Featuring a flowing single-level design anchored by a light-filled living spaces, and much more!
A spacious entrance hall, leads into the home, off to the left a generous master suite which offers a walk-in robe and a sparkling ensuite, and off to the right, is internal access into the double garage. A central family bathroom services the remaining 2 bedrooms - which both offer built in robes.
With two living spaces, the open plan design incorporates a spacious kitchen with a walk-in pantry, breakfast island bench, stainless steel appliances including an 900mm freestanding cooker gas cooktop/electric oven is situated at the rear of the home, with views out to the outdoor entertaining space.
Enjoy a lush garden with great lawn area, decked open pergola. There is also room at the side of the house for the caravan or boat, making the most of a corner block.
Other features include:- Split system heating and cooling, neutral color scheme, low maintenance surrounds.
Perfect permanent home, ideal permanent rental and great low maintenance holiday home!

Description:
Vendor Says Sell!
Situated in a highly sought after and exclusive location in Cowes, is this delightful double story home.
With stunning views to Westernport Bay, and a private and established garden - this is a rare opportunity to secure this seaside hideaway.
With downstairs main living, this property is suitable to all buyer demographics. An open plan living and dining area, leads out onto the downstairs north facing balcony - offering water views to the bay. The lovely kitchen boasts practical work spaces, with electric hotplates and electric under bench oven and a character lead light bay window. Located just off the living area is a quaint conservatory/garden room - the perfect spot to enjoy a book or the morning paper. The master bedroom with built in robes, a study or parents retreat, bathroom and separate laundry complete this level.
Upstairs you will find the second living area which extends out to another north facing balcony where you are spoilt by the most spectacular water views in the property. A kitchenette, 2 further bedrooms with built in robes, and a second bathroom - finishes the home or gives the option for a fully self contained guest level.
Other features included:- High ceilings, split system heating and cooling, water tanks, and double garage.
Ideally suited for holiday or permanent living, or as a coastal investment.
Contact us today! Vendor is keen to move the property, reasonable offers will be considered.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate, Phillip Island.

Description:
So Close To The Town
Positioned perfectly is this classic Phillip Island home, property like this doesn't come along every day. If you've been dreaming of a sensational Island coastal lifestyle then look no further!
Within walking distance to Thompson Avenue with all it has to offer, including cafes, restaurants, shops, schools and supermarkets, and Cowes pristine north facing bay beach.
This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom, double garage plus single carport family home is where dreams become reality. Set on a 681 sqm allotment, this central Cowes property is holiday move-in ready, or you could slowly renovate and reinvigorate. With a position like this anything is possible!
With the kitchen being the heart of the home, this one is no exception. The open plan living makes this perfect for the family to get together whilst on holidays or for permanent living. The 3 bedrooms all boast built in robes and the master equipped with an ensuite, plus a centralized family bathroom, separate laundry, creating a practical floor plan.
This home is calling for its next chapter. Inspection is a must. Call now to book your private inspection.

Description:
Foreshore/Views
Absolute front row that can never be built out. To say this property is a rarity is an understatement. Held in the same family since new this is your opportunity to secure an exclusive location so coveted by all. With nothing in front of you the northerly views stretch from the Cowes foreshore across the water to the sparkling evening lights of Somers and Flinders to Stoney Point and French Island. Enjoy direct beach access and the privacy this fabulous location offer.
The existing 3 bedroom beach house is zoned for the parents at one end and kids at the other. Two separate lounges PBE with open fire place, central kitchen and casual out door living drinking in that amazing water view.
Only minutes to Cowes, the boat ramp streets away, world class surf beaches and all that Philip Island has to offer. Set on 442m2 our owner had stunning bespoke plans done for a new two story residence that they are happy to provide to the new owner.
